name: CLOpenSSL
summary: Pre-built OpenSSL framework for iOS and macOS: full-featured toolkit for the TLS and SSL protocols as well as a general-purpose cryptography library.

prepare_command:
(
    echo "openssl-dynamic-iPhone.zip e2642e58b3f90d9ae82fd536d97475f2020e4cef2df002a9b3d0386a43367c6f"
    echo "openssl-dynamic-MacOSX.zip c20a720e7bc3d5197cf98d2314294338f0f9fb79e167c637e31f79d8d481fe35"
) | while read name hash
do
    echo "Downloading $name..."
    curl --location --output "$name"                 "https://github.com/cossacklabs/openssl-apple/releases/download/v1.1.107/$name"
    echo "Verifying $name..."
    if [[ "$(shasum -a 256 "$name" | awk '{print $1}')" != "$hash" ]]
    then
        echo "Checksum mismatch for $name"
        exit 1
    fi
    echo "Unpacking $name..."
    unzip "$name"
    rm "$name"
    mkdir -p "$name"
    mv openssl.framework "$name"
done
